content: crochet by annitka 2022 snowflake snowflake this doily has 3 rounds and measures about 4 10 cm in diameter video tutorial snowflake step by step https //www youtube com/watch v=utx-sl7xpvs 1 crochet by annitka 2022 snowflake materials  yarn the best option is cotton yarn for my spider i used cotton yarnart ideal 50 g 170 m / 1 76 oz 186 yds but you can use any color or thread brand you d like  hook the size of the hook depends on the thickness of the yarn you will be crocheting for my yarn i used the hook size 3 00 mm the size of the finished snowflake depends on the yarn and hook that you crochet  needle scissors note  pattern start with an magic_ring magic_ring or magic loop how to crochet magic_ring  finished coaster should be washed and blocked  stitches used in the pattern are not explained individually i would suggest you take a look at the internet for any stitch you don t know as there are tons of tutorials and videos out there 2 crochet by annitka 2022 snowflake stitch guide chain chain stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es space s - space s single_crochet - single_crochet stitch double_crochet double_crochet stitch treble_crochet - treble_crochet chain-3 picot = chain 3 single_crochet in top of double_crochet or treble_crochet chain-6 picot = chain 6 slip_stitch in top of treble_crochet *8 - number of repeat … - the numbers given after a colon at the end of a round denotes the total number of stitches in current round doily instructions start an magic_ring round 1 chain 4 counts as first double_crochet and chain 1 1 double_crochet chain 1 repeat 11 times in magic_ring adjusts the ring join with slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet 12 double_crochet 12 chain-1 sps round 2 chain 1 1 single_crochet in chain-1 space chain 6 repeat 11 times 1 single_crochet in last chain-1 space chain 2 and 1 double_crochet in top of first single_crochet counts as last chain-6 space 12 single_crochet 12 chain-6 sps round 3 chain 1 1 single_crochet in same space around last double_crochet * chain 2 in next chain-6 space 1 double_crochet chain-3 picot 1 treble_crochet chain-6 picot 1 treble_crochet chain-3 picot 1 double_crochet chain 2 1 single_crochet in next chain-6 space repeat from * around join with slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet 6 branches of snowflakes the snowflake is ready for a more professional look finished snowflake should be washed and blocked to block a snowflake you can use a starch solution glue or hairspray 3 crochet by annitka 2022 snowflake chart i would love if you tag or make a reference to me when showing your finished projects please use hashtags #crochetwithannitka on social media to share this pattern all in one simple search thank you so much for your support instagram an_nitka_ youtube crochet by annitka tiktok crochetbyannitka 4
